game.name: Sheep & Love
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You move in the French Pyrénées with your best friend. While meeting the locals, you are surprised to see that they're all: super nice, leftists, queer, great musicians and... find you to be the most fascinating person in the Valley ! (Lucky you !)
game.shortDescriptionEn: You move in the French Pyrénées with your best friend. While meeting the locals, you are surprised to see that they're all: super nice, leftists, queer, great musicians and... find you to be the most fascinating person in the Valley ! (Lucky you !)
